sentences.en: Copies of the relevant documents must be filed at court.
sentences.cn: 有关文件副本必须送交法院备案。

sentences.en: For ease of reference, only the relevant extracts of the regulations are included.
sentences.cn: 为了便于参照，仅摘录相关规则。

sentences.en: He consulted a number of relevant books and periodicals.
sentences.cn: 他参看了不少有关书刊.

sentences.en: He has decided to prosecute her after careful consideration of all the relevant facts.
sentences.cn: 在认真考虑了所有相关事实后，他决定起诉她。

sentences.en: Her appearance is not relevant to whether she can be a good teacher.
sentences.cn: 她的长相跟她能否当个好老师无关.

sentences.en: I don't think his remarks are relevant to our discussion.
sentences.cn: 我认为他的话不切我们的议题.

sentences.en: I think there was deliberate concealment of relevant documents.
sentences.cn: 我认为有人故意隐瞒相关文件。

sentences.en: I tried googling but couldn't find anything relevant.
sentences.cn: 我试着用搜索引擎检索，但找不到任何相关信息。

sentences.en: Make sure you enclose all the relevant certificates.
sentences.cn: 要保证把所有相关证书都放在里面。

sentences.en: On presentation of the relevant identity documents you may collect your property.
sentences.cn: 你只要出示有关的身份证件就可以领取你的财产.

sentences.en: Relevant documents were presented in court.
sentences.cn: 法庭上出示了相关的文件。

sentences.en: Relevant work experience is required for overseas postings.
sentences.cn: 派驻海外要求有相关的工作经验。

sentences.en: The MOD gave an undertaking to Saville that it had provided him with all relevant material.
sentences.cn: 国防部向萨维尔保证已向他提供了所有相关的资料。

sentences.en: The relevant inspecting organs shall give assistance thereto.
sentences.cn: 有关检查机关应当予以协助.

sentences.en: These materials are relevant to the case.
sentences.cn: 这些材料与这案件有关.

sentences.en: This point is really relevant and we had better move on.
sentences.cn: 这一点至关重要,我们还是接着谈吧.

sentences.en: We received all the relevant information.
sentences.cn: 我们收到了所有相关信息。

trans.tran_cn: 相关的，合适的，有意义的
trans.tran_en: directly relating to the subject or problem being discussed or considered
